result.title: API is working again!
result.content:
API method which I really like using (contest.hacks) is not working since few days. I tried on several computers being logged in and out and from friends accounts and I am still getting message known to all of you: Codeforces is temporary unavailable...

Link to check: contest.hacks?contestId=474.

What is funny is that other methods and other contests are working. Try contest.hacks?contestId=475 or user.info?handles=illi.

Update: everything is working fine now -- with many thanks to Codeforces team!
